Get ready to fly ✈️

 #REcalibrated #iflycaribbean https://t.co/NTg8iXcF9r

Enjoy 30% off plus earn 3x miles on travel between Trinidad and Jamaica. Book from January 07 to 13, 2022 for travel on January 14, 2022. 

Available on all fare types and via all booking channels. 

Click link in bio to book now ✈️

#iflycaribbean https://t.co/LVS55d9Q4t

#iflycaribbean https://t.co/0lY5YTekhP

data.text:
Cruising into the New Year at 40,000 ft. ✈️🎆
#iflycaribbean #wingcrushwednesday #wcw https://t.co/wf1H29EZ7Q

On Christmas morning, while most were unwrapping presents under their tree 🎄, some lucky passengers experienced that magic ✨ in the air on-board BW484 ✈️

Pictured is our In-Flight Elf, Purser Lue Ann Ross, delivering one of these gifts 🎁

#iflycaribbean https://t.co/oUmFariwwv

This Boxing Day may you and yours unbox the gifts of peace, joy and prosperity.

#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/QMXgBdbBNc

Merry Christmas and Season’s Greetings from our family to yours 🎅🎉

As you fly from near or far ✈️ to connect with the people that matter the most and gather around the Christmas tree 🎄, may your homes and hearts be filled with love, good health and happiness ❤️ #iflycaribbean https://t.co/6QII42ZU9z

Chances are you've been singing these classics while preparing for Christmas 🎤🎄🎶
Can you guess what they are?

#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/AUW4pb67R8

The magic of Christmas brings many cherished holiday memories shared with family and friends. Let us know your happiest ones!

#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean #christmas #caribbeanchristmas #christmasmememories https://t.co/Xoyi1rltMv
Our Team remains alert, committed and focused to ensure the safety, wellbeing and comfort of each passenger on every flight. ✈️🙌 #iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/UVn4d9IZwe

We’re making a list and checking it twice. Here’s a quick guide to help make your travel easier and nice 📝🎄✈️

#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/XXgc6aZW9U

We've added flights just for you! 
Be merry and bright this Christmas with 7 weekly flights from Trinidad to Barbados! ✈️🎄
Book Now
#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/2X3YonNkVC

Looking for gift items items for Christmas? 🎁
Visit our Pop Up Shop at Price Plaza, Chaguanas, on Saturday 18th December from 10am - 6pm, to purchase branded items for your family and friends. 
#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/4drcK4noHl
